thread.title: Re: OUCH! Ted Cruz toasts Harry Reid at #CPAC2017
thread.title_full: Re: OUCH! Ted Cruz toasts Harry Reid at #CPAC2017

author: Orwellian_Dilemma
title: Re: OUCH! Ted Cruz toasts Harry Reid at #CPAC2017
text:
‘Thank you’! Ted Cruz goes ‘nuclear’ on Harry Reid at #CPAC2017 Posted at 12:30 pm on February 23, 2017 by Doug P. 
CPAC is under way in Washington, DC , and Sen. Ted Cruz helped get things rolling with a bipartisan gesture. Well, sort of: "Harry Reid, thank you for Attorney General Jeff Sessions" @tedcruz glows at #CPAC2017 
— Sarah Boxer (@Sarah_Boxer) February 23, 2017 
Ouch! Big cheers at CPAC as Sen Ted Cruz R-TX thanks Harry Reid for nuclear option, allowing approval of Trump Cabinet 
— Jamie Dupree (@jamiedupree) February 23, 2017 On behalf of #CPAC2017 , thank you Harry Reid for Attorney General Jeff Sessions and the most conservative cabinet in years 
— Ted Cruz (@tedcruz) February 23, 2017 Trending
